## PyCharm Community Edition - A Comprehensive Guide

Python is one of the most popular programming languages of this era. Whether you are an experienced developer or an amateur, using the right development tools are highly essential to make your expertise highly productive. PyCharm is one such notable Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that is highly useful for python development. This comprehensive guide shares all about the PyCharm Community Edition, its features, benefits, and how to install and use the software efficiently.

### What is PyCharm Community Edition?

PyCharm Community Edition is a highly useful code editor for python developers, especially those who are in the open-source community. Developed by JetBrains, PyCharm is a free and open-source tool that comes with an intuitive interface and highly powerful set of features. Being a highly productive development tool for Python, developers around the world find this tool highly useful for web development, data science and machine learning.

### Features of PyCharm Community Edition

PyCharm Community Edition comes with a set of highly-functional features that supports the development process of Python professionals. Some of the most notable features include:

#### Code Editing

* Smart Python code editor
* Customizable code completion
* In-editor code analysis and warnings
* Refactorings and intention actions
* On-the-fly code highlighting and inspection
* Code snippets & customizable templates

#### Debugging

* Debugging for multiple threads
* Debugging for Python, Jython, and IronPython
* Remote debugging, and more

#### Navigation

* Fast code navigation, search, and filter
* Multiple language support: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more
* Easy switching between files, classes, methods, and searches
* Python-savvy code completion with automatic import

#### Tools and frameworks

* Django, Flask, Google App Engine, Pyramid, and web2py support
* Built-in and third-party tools

#### Plugins

* PyCharm Integration with IPython Notebook
* Python profiler integration
* Tornado testing integration
* Support for scientific tools such as matplotlib and numpy

### Benefits of using PyCharm Community Edition

Using PyCharm Community Edition provides an extensive range of benefits to Python developers. Some of the notable benefits are:

#### Simplified Coding Process

PyCharm simplifies coding and makes it an effortless task by predicting the next command or function as per the writing pattern. This intelligent tool predicts and suggests code statements based on different coding styles.

#### Intuitive Debugger

PyCharm Community Edition comes with an effective debugger, which makes it easy to keep a check over Python code during development. Code errors can be easily identified and fixed without having to spend much of your time.

#### Auto completion and Inspections

PyCharm Community Edition comes with an automatic code completion system, that completes the code whenever the next character is entered. This significantly reduces the time and manual effort required to write lengthy statements of functions.

#### Cross-Platform Compatibility

PyCharm Community Edition is a cross-platform tool, which means developers can use it across various operating systems like Windows, Linux, and Mac.

### How to install and use PyCharm Community Edition?

To install PyCharm Community Edition, follow these simple steps:

1. Visit https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/download/ and select the operating system you are using.
2. Click on the Download button to download the setup.
3. Once the installation file is downloaded, run the setup and follow the installation instructions.
4. Once the installation is complete, run PyCharm Community Edition.

### Conclusion

PyCharm Community Edition is a must-have tool for python developers, and it is packed with a bunch of amazing features and benefits that can drastically improve your productivity. From simplified coding to cross-platform compatibility, PyCharm Community Edition is a complete package that can take your python development to the next level. Hopefully, this comprehensive guide provides you with enough details about this amazing tool, and you're now ready to install and use it to take your projects to a whole new level.
